courses: Control of Fluid Power and Electrical Servomechanisms

projects.name: Efficiency Optimization using Full-Bridge Oscillation Transformer (FBoT) Control in an Electric Mini Loader
projects.summary: Developed and tested a nonlinear control system for MISO ON/OFF valves in a Full-Bridge Oscillation Transformer (FBoT) to improve efficiency in an electric mini loader, replacing traditional proportional valves. Employed a Kalman Filter for state estimation and for tracking slow-varying system parameters, contributing to better state estimation and increased performance.

projects.name: Energy Recovery System for a Universal Robot UR5
projects.summary: Developed an energy recovery system using supercapacitors instead of braking resistors for a UR5 robotic arm, designing and implementing a buck-boost converter to store and reuse braking energy, improving the robot's energy efficiency.

projects.name: Motion Control of a Fluid Power Cylinder Drive
projects.summary: Developed a motion control system for a fluid power cylinder drive, utilizing linear control theory and system modeling to enhance hydraulic system performance, and evaluated the use of glycerol as a sustainable alternative to hydraulic oil.

projects.name: Automatic Search & Rescue Drone
projects.summary: Developed an automatic drone swarm system to enhance water-related SAR operations by providing rapid, efficient, and cost-effective search capabilities using thermal and optical cameras, and implemented a robust control system for autonomous navigation and target detection.
